file.name: Traits_TraitDbId_GET_PUT.yaml
file.content:
info:
  title: BrAPI
  version: ''
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /traits/{traitDbId}:
    get:
      summary: Get the details of a specific Trait
      description: |-
        Retrieve the details of a single trait

        An Observation Variable has 3 critical parts: A Trait being observed, a Method for making the observation, and a Scale on which the observation can be measured and compared with other observations.
      parameters:
      - description: Id of the trait to retrieve details of.
        in: path
        name: traitDbId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader'
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TraitSingleResponse'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/404NotFound'
      tags:
      - Traits
    put:
      summary: Update an existing Trait
      description: Update an existing trait
      parameters:
      - description: Id of the trait to retrieve details of.
        in: path
        name: traitDbId
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - $ref: '#/components/parameters/authorizationHeader'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TraitNewRequest'
      responses:
        '200':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/TraitSingleResponse'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/400BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/401Unauthorized'
        '403':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/403Forbidden'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/404NotFound'
      tags:
      - Traits
components:
  responses:
    TraitSingleResponse:
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            title: TraitSingleResponse
            type: object
            properties:
              '@context':
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Context'
              metadata:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/metadata'
              result:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Trait'
            required:
            - metadata
            - result
      description: OK
      headers: {}
